channel.title: Battlescape / Innovationx Connecting
channel.description: I removed MYSQL , But is the Ip server sided ? So yes explain where i could change. I changed the ip At the client to mines ( works fine ) I could login and stuff , but when people try to login on the webclient , it says error connecting to server , and yes i portforwarded , and yes it works because on other servers i runned it worked fine either. Please help me.

item.title: Battlescape / Innovationx Connecting
item.dc:creator: @rifblood rifblood
item.description:
@rifblood wrote:

I removed MYSQL ,
But is the Ip server sided ? So yes explain where i could change.
I changed the ip At the client to mines ( works fine )
I could login and stuff , but when people try to login on the webclient , it says error connecting to server , and yes i portforwarded , and yes it works because on other servers i runned it worked fine either.
Please help me.
